content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

The main image shows two distinct structures:

Left Structure:
- Base: Red arch block
- Middle layer: Green horizontal block with a blue cube on top
- Two orange cylindrical pillars on the sides
- Orange triangular roof on top of the blue cube

Right Structure:
- Base: Red arch blocks and rectangular blocks
- Middle layer: Yellow horizontal blocks
- Top: Red rectangular blocks

Let me provide the assembly instructions for both structures:

Left Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 2 (red arch)
    Step2: Move block with index 6 (green horizontal block)
    Step3: Move block with index 10 (orange cylinder)
    Step4: Move block with index 10 (orange cylinder again)
    Step5: Move block with index 3 (blue cube)
    Step6: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular roof)
}

Right Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (red arch)
    Step2: Move block with index 1 (red arch again)
    Step3: Move block with index 7 (yellow horizontal block)
    Step4: Move block with index 7 (yellow horizontal block again)
    Step5: Move block with index 4 (red rectangular block)
    Step6: Move block with index 4 (red rectangular block again)
}

The structures are built from bottom to top, ensuring stability. Each block is used exactly as shown in the dictionary without any rotation.
